value:
$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|Njörðr.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Who are you?! How did you
get inside my palace?$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|I am Kvasir.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|Kvasir? There is no goddess of that
name in Vanaheimr.$k$pAs king, there is no god within
Vanaheimr beyond my sight.$k$p...And yet, here you are.$k$pWhat...are you?$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|I have come from the future to relay
a message, King Njörðr.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Gullveig lives—in me.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Gullveig? No... This cannot be...
If the legends are true, then...then...$k$p$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|Then you know that in speaking
to me, hearing my words, the path
of your future is already decided.$k$pTime is the master of all things.
That is the nature of the Golden
Seer's curse...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_闇ハイドラ,ch05_64_Hydra_M_Dark23,Face|This world is wrong, wrong, wrong!
This is not the path I am meant
to tread!$k$p$Sbs1000|
